attributes.action: End all accommodation, financial benefits for illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is spiralling into austerity, the UK tax payer, state pensioners and those on social welfare are suffering from the fiscal cuts.

The daily cost of housing the immigrants and asylum seekers is rising exponentially daily.
It's time to say enough is enough
attributes.background:
Stop this madness, the Government is encouraging the mass of illegal entries by awarding them with a life of luxury at the expense of the British tax payer.

Stop this lifestyle and immigration will dwindle

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406

Stop financial and other support for asylum seekers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705383
